Trust your vision to professionals ‚Äî New Vision Clinic in Vilnius. ‚ú¥Ô∏è Eye Center No. 1 in Lithuania. ‚úÖ Ophthalmology Center ‚Äî take advantage of special offers on eye treatment. ‚úÖ Advanced diagnostics and effective treatment. üëç A reputation proven over time
HomePage.title: NEW VISION
HomePage.description: Laser vision correction and the treatment of astigmatism and cataract are performed as safe, state-of-the-art eye surgery by experienced ophthalmic surgeons specialising in restoring clear vision.
HomePage.slogan: Laser eye surgery, astigmatism, and cataract treatment ‚Äì our tasks, which we perform professionally, safely, and efficiently.
HomePage.promoText: Money-back offer for laser vision correction
HomePage.raynerTextPC: <bold>the world's #1</bold> intraocular lens for safe and effective cataract treatment
HomePage.servicesTitle: In our ophthalmology clinic, we provide a full range of ophthalmology services
HomePage.servicesText: At the eye disease clinic ‚ÄúNaujas regƒójimas‚Äù in Vilnius, patients have access to all modern methods of treating eye conditions, allowing vision problems to be managed effectively and safely.
HomePage.advantagesSubtitle: Advantages of our ophthalmology clinic in Vilnius
HomePage.advantagesTitle: Our ophthalmologists in Vilnius are committed to giving every patient the chance to see the world bright and clear again, to the fullest extent that restored vision allows
HomePage.advantagesText: At our medical centre, every patient has access to a full range of ophthalmology services. Consultations and treatment are provided by experienced, highly qualified eye doctors.
HomePage.choiceTitle: Choosing an eye clinic is an important decision for everyone
HomePage.choiceText1: Many people do not realise how much good vision affects their daily life until they personally face the first signs of difficulties and a noticeable decline in eyesight.
HomePage.choiceText2: Vision problems can develop at any age, which is why it is essential to see an eye specialist and have a proper eye examination as soon as the first symptoms appear.
HomePage.choiceGreen: If you have been thinking about having a comprehensive eye check-up, now is the perfect time to book an appointment and take care of your vision.
HomePage.approachTitle: At our eye clinic, every patient receives a personalised treatment plan: for some, the best option is laser vision correction, while for others conservative treatment and regular monitoring are more appropriate. Our goal is to choose the safest and most effective solution for you.
HomePage.aboutTitle: Our eye clinic in Vilnius combines medical professionalism with advanced technology to protect your vision
HomePage.aboutText1: From the very first day, our goal has been to offer patients the best that modern ophthalmology can provide ‚Äì precise diagnostics, state-of-the-art equipment and effective treatment methods for a wide range of eye conditions.
HomePage.aboutText2: Our mission is to do everything possible to help you maintain your vision in excellent condition and continue seeing the world bright and clear for many years.
HomePage.doctorsTitle: Our team consists of highly qualified eye doctors, medical science degree holders and senior specialists with extensive clinical experience
HomePage.doctorsText: Consultations and surgery are performed by some of the leading specialists in ophthalmology, as evidenced by dozens of published scientific papers and tens of thousands of successfully completed operations.
HomePage.feedbacksTitle: What our patients say about us
HomePage.feedbacksText: Our eye centre has performed over 1,000,000 successful laser vision correction procedures and provided more than 5,000,000 ophthalmology consultations.
HomePage.bookingTitle: Convenient booking and transparent consultation cost
HomePage.bookingText: We have made the process of contacting the clinic as simple as possible. You only need to book an appointment with an ophthalmologist in Vilnius online or by phone.
HomePage.upButtonHint: To the top of the page

Menu.ƒØdomybƒós-apie-akis-ir-regƒÖ: Interesting facts about eyes and vision
Menu.dovanu-kupono: Rules for the use of the gift voucher
Menu.lazerine-akiu-korekcija-smalText: A fast and precise way to reduce dependence on glasses or contact lenses for myopia, hyperopia, and astigmatism; the method is selected based on corneal parameters and your goals.
Menu.kataraktos-operacija-smalText: Microsurgical removal of the clouded lens with implantation of an intraocular lens to restore clear vision and improve quality of life.
Menu.akiu-patikrinimas-smalText: A comprehensive vision and eye health assessment using modern equipment: precise measurements, evaluation of the retina and optic nerve, clear recommendations, and a next-step plan.
Menu.dry-eye-syndrome-treatment-smalText: A personalized diagnostic and treatment program to reduce dryness, burning, and gritty sensation: tailored eye drops, care products, and procedures with outcome monitoring.
Menu.reminder-before-a-comprehensive-pediatri: Reminder before a comprehensive pediatric examination

AboutPage.titleSEO: About the Clinic. Eye Doctor Consultation | New Vision Clinic
AboutPage.descriptionSEO: ‚ûî About the Clinic. ‚ú¥Ô∏è The No. 1 Eye Disease Center in Lithuania. ‚úÖ Modern diagnostics and effective treatment. üëç A reputation proven over time
AboutPage.title: About the Clinic
AboutPage.description: We help you regain clear vision and a full life without glasses
AboutPage.aboutTitle: The ‚ÄúNew Vision‚Äù Eye Clinic provides medical care with heightened attention to controlling every stage of treatment and ensuring patient safety.
AboutPage.aboutText1: From day one, our mission has been to offer patients only the best that modern ophthalmology can provide today. Our team includes leading ophthalmology specialists, as evidenced by scientific publications and tens of thousands of procedures performed.
AboutPage.aboutText2: Our mission is to support you in maintaining excellent vision without surgical intervention whenever possible. If an operation is still required, we guarantee that it will be performed by experienced and highly qualified ophthalmic surgeons.
AboutPage.aboutText3: The high level of our specialists is achieved through daily clinical practice and continuous professional development. A true physician learns throughout life, and our staff embraces this principle. We are proud of our doctors.
AboutPage.advantTitle: You can be confident in the quality of services provided at our ophthalmology clinic in Vilnius, Lithuania.
AboutPage.advantText: By choosing us, you can always rely on professional, qualified care.
AboutPage.ctaText: Book an eye examination to learn more about the condition of your visual system!
AboutPage.ctaTitle: Take care of your vision health today!
AboutPage.methodsTitle: We Perform Procedures Using Unique Techniques
AboutPage.methodsGreen: For those who choose the best and accept no compromise
AboutPage.methodsText: Only in our clinic is the ‚Äúcold‚Äù laser vision correction method used, designed to maximize safety for your eyes.
AboutPage.teamTitle: Our professional team treats the most complex eye conditions:
AboutPage.teamLi1: In cases of complex eye pathologies and injuries
AboutPage.teamLi2: When the problem cannot be resolved with conservative methods
AboutPage.teamLi3: When laser vision correction is contraindicated for medical reasons

ServicesPage.titleSEO: Ophthalmology Services in Vilnius | New Vision Clinic
ServicesPage.descriptionSEO: Full list of ophthalmology services in Vilnius ‚ú¥Ô∏è The No. 1 Eye Disease Center in Lithuania. ‚úÖ Modern diagnostics and effective treatment. üëç A reputation proven over time
ServicesPage.title: Ophthalmic Services
ServicesPage.description: The ‚ÄúNew Vision‚Äù clinic (Vilnius, Lithuania) provides a full range of modern, high-technology ophthalmic services for the diagnosis and treatment of eye diseases in patients of all ages.
ServicesPage.sectionTitle: We diagnose a broad spectrum of ophthalmic conditions and perform microsurgical treatment in accordance with current medical protocols
ServicesPage.lazerCorectionMethodsTitle: Unique cold laser correction technology ‚Äî only in our clinic
ServicesPage.doctorsText: Our doctors will carefully study the condition of your visual system and determine whether correction is possible in your case.
ServicesPage.lazerinis-akiu-ligu-gydymas: in laser treatment of eye diseases
ServicesPage.cataractMethodsTitle: Revolutionary cataract treatment technologies ‚Äî exclusively in our clinic
ServicesPage.cataractMethodsText: We use the most advanced phacoemulsification technique ‚Äî the 'Water Flow', which is considered the 'gold standard' in modern ophthalmology.
ServicesPage.lazerEditionPriceText: The technique is selected after the examination, individually for you, to obtain the best result
ServicesPage.callUsText: If you have any questions, call our friendly call center or make an appointment for diagnostics with further consultation.
ServicesPage.catIndTitle: We treat cataract in complex cases:
ServicesPage.catIndText: At our centre, cataract removal procedures are performed by surgeons with experience of at least 50,000 successful interventions.
ServicesPage.catIndListItem2: correction of outcomes after unsuccessful procedures in other clinics
ServicesPage.catIndListItem3: management of the most challenging cases
ServicesPage.raynerCardTitle: We use only premium intraocular lenses.
ServicesPage.raynerTextPC: <bold>the world's #1</bold> intraocular lens for cataract treatment
ServicesPage.reynerItem1: developed with the help of artificial intelligence
ServicesPage.raynerAdv: Rayner GALAXY is now available for implantation at our clinic
ServicesPage.lansText1: BiVision RLE is most often recommended after the age of 45, when typical signs of presbyopia appear‚Äîblurred vision while reading, the need to hold text farther away, and rapid visual fatigue. Implantation of a multifocal lens restores comfort and helps reduce the need to constantly switch between different glasses.
ServicesPage.lansText2: At our centre in Vilnius, refractive lens exchange procedures are performed by surgeons with experience of at least 50,000 successful operations.
ServicesPage.raynerCompareText: Rayner GALAXY is based on an innovative spiral optical design. It delivers clear images at any distance and significantly reduces the likelihood of unwanted effects such as halos, glare, or blurred vision. Rayner GALAXY is based on an innovative spiral optical design. It delivers clear images at any distance and significantly reduces the likelihood of unwanted effects such as halos, glare, or blurred vision.
ServicesPage.raynerCompareItem5: Natural image perception similar to a healthy human eye
ServicesPage.raynerUniqItem1Text: Comfortable vision for far, near, and intermediate ranges.
ServicesPage.raynerUniqItem2Text: Fewer halos, glare, and image blur.
ServicesPage.raynerUniqItem3Text: Quick and comfortable adjustment to the new vision.
ServicesPage.raynerUniqItem4Text: A smooth transition of focus between different distances.
ServicesPage.raynerUniqItem5Text: As natural a visual experience as possible, with soft contrast and color rendering.
ServicesPage.raynerUniqItem6Text: Premium materials and consistently high visual quality.
ServicesPage.raynerAboutTitle: Rayner GALAXY ‚Äî a new standard of vision, available at the ‚ÄúNew Vision‚Äù Eye Clinic (Vilnius, Lithuania)
ServicesPage.raynerAboutText1: The innovative <link>Rayner GALAXY</link> intraocular lens is a premium solution for patients who want not only to eliminate cataracts, but also to regain youthful, clear, and comfortable vision‚Äîoften without a constant need for glasses in everyday life.
ServicesPage.raynerAboutText2: Rayner GALAXY is a next‚Äëgeneration intelligent optical technology. The lens was created by the UK company Rayner‚Äîone of the world‚Äôs leading manufacturers in ophthalmic surgery‚Äîusing artificial‚Äëintelligence algorithms to enhance vision quality and overall visual comfort for the patient.
ServicesPage.raynerAboutItem: This is the world‚Äôs first intraocular lens developed with the participation of artificial intelligence

Contacts.rulesParkingTitle: Please note! Parking near the clinic is not available
Contacts.rulesParkingText: As the clinic is located in the very heart of the Old Town, there are no designated parking spaces for patients. If you plan to arrive by car, please drop the patient off at the entrance and use nearby parking zones. A blue parking zone operates near the clinic (‚Ç¨2.5 per hour), while a more distant red zone costs ‚Ç¨1.2 per hour. The parking zone color is indicated on the parking meter. We apologize for any inconvenience.
